title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message:
I'm kind of stuck with this old 820-2530 board. When plugged in the light on the charger is blinking.
PPBUS_G3H i fluctuating between 3.5V and 11.5V, at least this is what i can read on my multimeter. I guess something makes the charger start and stop.
It does not run on either battery or charger.

Current sensing resistors measures fine.
If I remove F7000 or R7008 the blinking slows down.
If I remove both F7000 and R7008 I get solid green light and PPBUS_G3H is 12.5V.

There is no short to ground om PPBUS_G3H.

I have measured resistance to ground on both PPBUS_G3H and PP3V42_G3H and they are both very high.

I have replaced U7000.
I have replaced both Q7020 and Q7021.
I have replaced C7008.

I do need some pointers now, I feel I'm looking in the wrong place.

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: You did replace with ISL6258 and not 6259? Check DCIN, VDD and VDDP

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: Yes, ISL6258, DCIN fluctuates as well, so as long as I get the blinking, nothing else seems stable. VDD and VDDP fluctuates as well

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: When removing F7000 I get 11,7V on PPBUS_G3H and 5V on VDD and VDDP

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: Q7000/7001 and U7060 are next. You did inspect for water damage?

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: Hmm, replaced them all, but still the same :(

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: It was Wine damaged, but there was only slight corrosion around the audio chip as far as I could tell

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: What does it do on a battery that has a charge in it? Does in battery indicator show anything?

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: Nothing, when a fully charged battery connected I get 11.96V on PPBUS_G3H but it won't start. Battery indicator shows nothing.

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: If the SMC is running and the BIL is good then it should show battery level. Check SMC_RESET and 3V42 and SMC_ONOFF.

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message:
Checking SMC_RESET at R2072 pin 2 i get 0v  checking SMC_ONOFF at R5170 pin 1 I get 3.42V

What is the BIL? also you said "check 3v42"  

Checked ppv3v42_G3H at C5003 pin 1 3.4v C5009 pin 1 3.42V
Checked SMC_BIL_BUTTON_L at R5181 pin 1 3.42V

title: 820-2530 blinking green light
message: No idea why this year old thread is pulled from the dead. Start a new one.
